TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolboxItem extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ToolboxItem extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 提供工具箱项的基实现。

span.span: Provides a base implementation of a toolbox item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可在设计时环境的工具箱中显示的工具箱项的基类。 is a base class for toolbox items that can be displayed in the toolbox of a design-time environment. 工具箱项通常表示在设计模式文档上调用时要创建的组件。A toolbox item typically represents a component to create when invoked on a design mode document. 类提供了一些方法和属性，这些方法和属性提供工具箱项的显示属性、使用工具箱项的显示属性、在使用时创建组件或组件，以及在工具箱数据库内为持久性序列化和反序列化自身。The class provides the methods and properties needed to provide the toolbox with the display properties for the toolbox item, to create a component or components when used, and to serialize and deserialize itself for persistence within the toolbox database. 可以使用要创建的名称、位图和类型来配置 类的实例，而无需创建派生自 的类。An instance of the class can be configured with a name, bitmap, and type to create, without creating a class that derives from . 类还为自定义工具箱项实现提供基类。The class also provides a base class for custom toolbox item implementations. 自定义 可以创建多个组件。A custom can create multiple components. 若要实现自定义工具箱项，必须从 派生，并重写 、和 方法。To implement a custom toolbox item, you must derive from and override the , , and methods. 若要使 正常工作，必须配置以下属性和方法：The following properties and methods must be configured for a to function correctly: - 属性指定工具箱项在工具箱中显示时的标签。The property specifies the label for the toolbox item when displayed in a toolbox. - 属性指定项创建的组件类型的完全限定名称。The property specifies the fully qualified name of the type of the component that the item creates. 如果派生类创建多个组件，则可以使用 属性，也可以不使用该属性，具体取决于 方法重写是否依赖于此属性的值。If a derived class creates multiple components, the property may or may not be used, contingent on whether a method override depends on the value of this property. - 属性指定包含项创建的组件类型的程序集。The property specifies the assembly that contains the type of a component that the item creates. - 属性可以选择指定要在工具箱中的工具箱项的显示名称旁边显示的位图图像。The property optionally specifies a bitmap image to display next to the display name for the toolbox item in the toolbox. - 属性可以选择包含任何 对象，这些对象确定是否可以在特定组件上使用工具箱项。The property optionally contains any objects that determine whether the toolbox item can be used on a particular component. - 方法返回要在使用此工具的位置插入的组件实例。The method returns the component instance or instances to insert where this tool is used. - 方法将工具箱项保存到指定的 。The method saves the toolbox item to a specified . - 方法从指定 中包含的状态信息配置工具箱项。The method configures the toolbox item from the state information contained in the specified . - 如果未重写 方法以使行为不同， 方法会将工具箱项配置为创建指定类型的组件。The method configures the toolbox item to create the specified type of component, if the method has not been overridden to behave differently. - 属性指示是否可以更改工具箱项的属性。The property indicates whether the properties of the toolbox item can be changed. 工具箱项添加到工具箱后通常会被锁定。A toolbox item is typically locked after it is added to a toolbox. - 方法会锁定工具箱项。The method locks a toolbox item. - 如果 `true` 属性， 方法将引发异常。The method throws an exception if the property is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了一个组件，该组件使用 接口将文本数据格式处理程序或 添加到 "工具箱"。The following code example provides a component that uses the interface to add a text data format handler, or , to the toolbox. 数据编写器回调委托将粘贴到工具箱中的任何文本数据传递到窗体上，并将其拖到一个自定义 ，该自定义创建包含文本的 。The data creator callback delegate passes any text data pasted to the toolbox and dragged onto a form to a custom that creates a containing the text. [!code-cpp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CPP/textdatatextboxcomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CS/textdatatextboxcomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/VB/textdatatextboxcomponent.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类作为自定义工具箱项实现的基类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class as a base class for a custom toolbox item implementation. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或者设置程序集的名称，该程序集中包含工具箱项创建的一个或多个类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the assembly that contains the type or types that the toolbox item creates.

value.span: ，它指示包含将创建的一个或多个类型的程序集。

span.span: An that indicates the assembly containing the type or types to create.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定包含要创建的组件类型的程序集。The property specifies the assembly that contains the types of the components to create.

para.span: 如果派生的工具箱项类创建多个位于不同程序集中的组件，您必须确保您的项目中存在对这些程序集的引用。

span.span: If your derived toolbox item class creates multiple components that are located in different assemblies, you must ensure that references to these assemblies exist in your project.

para.span: 建议从 方法的重载添加这些引用。

span.span: It is advisable to add these references from an overload of the method.

para.span: 即使 方法不依赖于 属性的值，也应确保将此属性设置为要创建的组件之一所属的程序集，因为它会显示在 Visual Studio 的 "**自定义工具箱**" 对话框中。

span.span: Even if your method does not depend on the value of the property, you should ensure that this property is set to the assembly that one of the components to create belongs to, because it is displayed in the **Customize Toolbox** dialog box in Visual Studio.

summary.span: 组件创建后立即发生。

span.span: Occurs immediately after components are created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次创建该工具箱项的组件时都会引发 事件。The event is raised each time components of this toolbox item are created. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器宿主用于访问 接口的实现。The designer host is used to access an implementation of the interface. 但是，加载的类型不会添加到设计器宿主的引用列表中。However, the loaded type is not added to the list of references in the designer host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未重写 方法以使行为不同， 方法会将工具箱项配置为创建指定的类型。The method configures the toolbox item to create the specified type, if the method has not been overridden to behave differently. 此方法执行以下操作：This method performs the following operations: - 将 属性设置为一个表示指定类型的程序集的 。Sets the property to an indicating the assembly of the specified type. - 根据指定类型的名称将 属性设置为短类型名称。Sets the property to a short type name based on the name of the specified type. - 将在指定类型上找到的任何 特性添加到 属性集合。Adds any attributes found on the specified type to the property collection.

span.span: A that provides data for the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 调用工具箱项以创建组件并且 方法返回后，将调用此方法。This method is called after a toolbox item is invoked to create components and the method has returned. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnComponentsCreating(class System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs args) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnComponentsCreating (args As ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs)

abstract member OnComponentsCreating : System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs -> unit override this.OnComponentsCreating : System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that provides data for the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 在调用 "工具箱" 项以创建组件之后，就在调用 方法之前调用此方法。This method is called after a toolbox item is invoked to create components, just before the method is called. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

value.span: 表示工具箱中该工具箱项的 。

span.span: A that represents the toolbox item in the toolbox.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此位图应为16x16 像素，应在 Visual Studio "工具箱" 中使用，而不是在设计图面上使用。This bitmap should be 16x16 pixels and should be used in the Visual Studio toolbox, not on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 锁定工具箱项后， 属性字典变为只读。The property dictionary becomes read-only after the toolbox item has been locked. 属性字典中的值通过 方法进行验证，默认值是从 方法获取的。Values in the properties dictionary are validated through the method, and default values are obtained from the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当在属性字典中设置值时，就会调用 方法。The method is called whenever a value is set in the property dictionary. 使用此方法，可以在提交对象之前更改对象的值，或通过引发异常拒绝对象的值。With this method, you can change the value of an object before committing it, or reject it by throwing an exception.
